name: Kaori After Story
summary: Following Kaori's ending in ACE Academy, your now girlfriend has invited you to spend Christmas and New Years with her family. Your trip takes you to the countryside of Isokaze, where her parents and twin sisters are surprised to see that Kaori has brought a boy home! From meeting the parents, enjoying winter activities and spending intimate time with Kaori to learn more about her and her past, it will be a holiday to remember!
info:
• 游戏开发: PixelFade Studio
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: ADV
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 2018-12-03
